title: Boards Bug?
body: Everytime I post something / someone else posts something, it'd come up as posted 23/24 hours ago and continue on from that. This is pretty misleading and sometimes confusing. I'm not sure if i'm the only person experiencing this or not.

replies.body:
Try relogging, if that doesn't work clear your cookies/cache and see if that fixes it.

EDIT: as an extra, check if your computer has the right date.
